title: Didn't get IP boost
body: Verified mail,didn't get IP boost. Help!

replies.body: It looks like DTN was able to help you out here.  Indeed, there may be a delay before the boost is added to your account.  You'll see the boost enabled via an icon on the top right of your profile via the client.  Hope that helps!
I didn't get it. I sent a ticket at technical issues hope it works
It can take some time for your IP boost to be enabled. Please wait up to 24 hours!
Thanks. There have passed like 16 hours. If I don't get after 24 do I have to create ticket?
Yes, if you have account issues of any kind you'll need to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
